devdoc.author: SuperdaoTeam
devdoc.details: Implementation of https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-721[ERC721] Non-Fungible Token Standard, including the Metadata extension, but not including the Enumerable extension, which is available separately as {ERC721Enumerable}.

claim(address,bytes32[],bytes32).details: Register an address for `merkleProof` with a given `tierValue`. Note: bytes32 element is generic and can represent various things depending on the whitelisted values.

devdoc.title: ERC721WhitelistClaim
